title: Episode 27: Ed Harcourt, Douglas Corrigan and Nonstaurants
description: This week: pop maestro Ed Harcourt tells Rico his recipes for lamb and schizophrenia… We learn about the aviator who took a wrong turn into the history books… and Brendan says “oui” to nonstaurants.
contentencoded:
This week: pop maestro Ed Harcourt tells Rico his recipes for lamb and schizophrenia… We learn about the aviator who took a wrong turn into the history books… and Brendan says “oui” to nonstaurants.


Icebreaker: Matty Staudt

Stitcher.com’s infamous Matty Staudt is a man well-qualified to tell jokes that begin with “A man walks into a bar.”
teaser: This week: pop maestro Ed Harcourt tells Rico his recipes for lamb and schizophrenia… We learn about the aviator who took a wrong turn into the history books… and Brendan says “oui” to nonstaurants.
